page.title: 03Trade in the area
page.content: In all four villages covered in this survey there isn't 1 shop or inn,but Shelton has a post office but this doesn't deal with trade in other way. Therefore all trade in the area is brought in by travelling tradesMEN. These are mainly food merchants who bring meat,veg.,milk,bread etc. Newspapers are brought in from outside the area but residents have to travel to buy general supplies and furnishing etc.The main shopping areas are Newark Notttingham,Bingham and Grantham.Quite alot of residents grow there own fruit and vegetables and a few farmers raise their own meat stock.Shopping is mainly done once a week and so fridges and freezers are used alot.Door to door salesman are a thing of the past because of high travel costs.Gypsies venders occasionly pass through with trade.
